data.title: Broadway In Chicago Illinois High School Musical Theatre Awards IHSMTA 2019

data.text:
*Recipient of the Rising Star Award from The Jimmy Awards®

Best Scenic Design Nominees

Presented by SPL

Benet Academy, Pippin*, designed by Ramon Marth and Charlie Pipal

Bolingbrook High School, Jekyll & Hyde, designed by Mark Wayne

Cary-Grove High School, All Shook Up, designed by Mike Schiestel

Coal City High School, Tuck Everlasting, designed by Celeste Sheridan

Hinsdale South High School, Chicago, designed by Dan Marema, Rob Pold and Kathy Petrak

Best Choreography Nominees

Cary-Grove High School, All Shook Up*, Choreographed by Amy Krigas

Crystal Lake South High School, Newsies, choreographed by Colleen Cameron

Deerfield High School, Crazy For You, choreographed by Susan S. Gorman

Libertyville High School, Pippin, choreographed by Eryn Brown

The Chicago HS for the Arts, Bring It On: The Musical, choreographed by Brandon DiCriscio and Nicole Scatchel

Best Ensemble Nominees

Libertyville High School, Pippin*

Cary-Grove High School, All Shook Up

Bradley Bourbonnais Community High School, Les Miserables

Deerfield High School, Crazy For You

Oak Park & River Forest High School, Chicago

Best Direction Nominees

Susan S. Gorman, Deerfield High School, Crazy For You*

Brian Wand & Lauren Butera, Benet Academy, Pippin

Jack Micetich, Coal City High School, Tuck Everlasting

Jennifer Goss, St. Charles East High School, The 25th Annual Putnam County Spelling Bee

Abra Chusid, Stevenson High School, Shrek: The Musical

Best Overall Production Nominees

Presented by Guardian Music Travel

Cary-Grove High School, All Shook Up*

Benet Academy, Pippin

Coal City High School, Tuck Everlasting

Deerfield High School, Crazy For You

York Community High School, Bright Star

*Denotes Award Recipient
